tools.name: seeker
tools.description: Accurately Locate Smartphones using Social Engineering
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/thewhiteh4t/seeker.git
                  cd seeker/
                  chmod +x install.sh
                  ./install.sh
tools.author: thewhiteh4t

tools.name: Findomain
tools.description: The fastest and complete solution for domain recognition
tools.install:
pkg install rust make perl
                  cargo install findomain
                  cd $HOME/.cargo/bin
                  ./findomain
tools.author: Findomain
